tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE approved_weightlifting_techniques (
  technique_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  technique_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  technique_description TEXT,
  technique_category VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
)

CREATE TABLE guidelines (
    guideline_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    guideline_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    guideline_description TEXT,
    technique_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES approved_techniques(technique_id)
);

CREATE TABLE rules (
    rule_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    rule_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    rule_description TEXT,
    technique_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES approved_techniques(technique_id)
);

CREATE TABLE athletes (
    athlete_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    athlete_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    athlete_country VARCHAR(50),
    athlete_weight DECIMAL(5,2),
    technique_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (technique_id) REFERENCES approved_techniques(technique_id)
);

CREATE TABLE records (
    record_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_title VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    record_description TEXT,
    athlete_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (athlete_id) REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id)
);

CREATE TABLE competitions (
    competition_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    competition_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    competition_location VARCHAR(100),
    competition_date DATE,
    winner_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (winner_id) REFERENCES athletes(athlete_id)
);
